name: Late photographer 2 free
description:
Game type:
This is an easy shooting game.
Shooting is automatic. You can also control the direction manually.
There are 10 weapons in total.
You can get some money by destroying enemy planes.
Using money to upgrade weapons can get higher attack power.
There are also weapon skills that can get higher attack power.

Reincarnation system:
When you find it difficult to destroy the enemy aircraft, you can choose to retain the attribute reincarnation.
So that you can win the battle more easily.
